briefTitle: Quality of Life and Cosmetic Outcomes of Breast-Conserving Surgery According to Localization Method
officialTitle: Quality of Life and Cosmetic Outcomes of Breast-Conserving Surgery According to Localization Method (TRIGUIDE Trial) - A Randomized Trial
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients diagnosed with non-palpable and ecovisible infiltrating breast carcinoma, classified as T1 and T2, eligible for primary breast-conserving surgery (BCS)

Exclusion Criteria:

* lesions \<5mm
* multicentric tumors
* extensive calcifications not visible by ultrasound
* level III oncoplastic techniques or mastectomy
